===================================================================================

Los Angeles, 1949. Merciless, the kingpin Mickey Cohen (Sean Penn), born in Brooklyn, commands your city, dominating share of the profits from transactions with drugs, guns, prostitutes and - if he can - every bet placed west of Chicago. And not only does it all with the protection of his goons, but also police and politicians under its control. It's enough to intimidate even the bravest of police and tough ... except, perhaps, a small secret group outside the police department of the city of Los Angeles led by Sergeant John O'Mara (Josh Brolin) and Jerry Wooters (Ryan Gosling), who come together to try to put an end to Cohen.
